common.mail_hostname_tooltip: Enter the MX record configured on your DNS service provider
common.rspamd_credentials_tooltip: Use your login credentials to access Rspamd

status.title: Status
status.name: Name
status.rspamd_webapp_description: Advanced filter management and message history

action.report-queue-status: List deferred messages in postfix queue

welcome.title: Welcome to Mail
welcome.welcome_message: Enter the following information to start using Mail
welcome.select_domain_description: Select a user domain for the mail server. An email address will be created for every user in this domain
welcome.no_domain_configured_description: Please configure a user domain first
welcome.hostname_pattern: Must be a valid fully qualified domain name
welcome.hostname_format: Must be a valid fully qualified domain name
welcome.mail_domain_pattern: Must be a valid fully qualified domain name
welcome.mail_domain_format: Must be a valid fully qualified domain name

domains.title: Domains
domains.name: Name
domains.add_user_addresses_from_user_domain: Add user addresses from user domain {userDomain}
domains.add_user_addresses_from_user_domain_tool: Create an email address for every user in the user domain
domains.delete_domain_explanation: All associated email addresses will be deleted as well. However, all email messages received and sent by this domain will be preserved.
domains.required_if_accept_unknown_recipients: Required if "Accept unknown recipients" is enabled
domains.required_if_copy_inbound_messages: Required if "Copy inbound messages" is enabled
domains.accept_unknown_recipients_tooltip: All email messages sent to unknown recipients will be accepted and delivered to the specified destination. This option cannot be enabled if Add addresses from user domain is enabled
domains.add_group_addresses_from_user_domain: Add group addresses from user domain {userDomain}
domains.add_group_addresses_from_user_domain_too: Create an email address for every group in the user domain
domains.dkim_tooltip: Enable DKIM signing for outgoing messages to prevent spoofing
domains.dkim_txt_record_description: Create the TXT record required by DKIM at your {domain} DNS service provider by choosing one of the following procedures
domains.dkim_txt_record_key_procedure: Set default._domainkey as record key and paste the record data
domains.dkim_txt_record_raw_procedure: Paste the full TXT record in raw form
domains.domain_pattern: Must be a valid fully qualified domain name
domains.domain_format: Must be a valid fully qualified domain name

addresses.title: Addresses
addresses.destinations_placeholder: Choose destinations or type an external email addresses
addresses.destinations_required: Choose or type at least one destination
addresses.destinations_enum: One or more destinations are invalid

mailboxes.title: Mailboxes
mailboxes.no_user_mailbox_description: There is no user mailbox configured
mailboxes.no_public_mailbox_description: There is no public mailbox configured
mailboxes.destinations_placeholder: Choose destinations or type an external email addresses
mailboxes.keep_messages_on_server: Keep a copy of messages on this server
mailboxes.forward_enabled_but_no_destination: If "Forward messages" is enabled, at least one forward address is required
mailboxes.wildcard_address_info_title: A new wildcard address will be automatically created
mailboxes.wildcard_address_info_description: E.g. if you create marketing public mailbox, a wildcard address marketing@ will be created.
mailboxes.invalid_custom_quota_sameas_default_valu: Custom quota must be different from the default quota
mailboxes.at_least_one_member: At least one member is required
mailboxes.delete_public_mailbox_explanation: All messages inside this public folder will be permanently deleted.
mailboxes.forward_number_one_of: One or more forward addresses are invalid
mailboxes.forward_enum: One or more forward addresses are invalid
mailboxes.member_not_found: Member {member} not found. If you edit the mailbox it will be removed
mailboxes.multiple_members_not_found: Members not found: {members}. If you edit the mailbox they will be removed
mailboxes.confirm_disable_mailbox: Do you really want to disable mailbox {mailbox}?
mailboxes.confirm_disable_mailbox_2: It will stop receiving messages and you won't be able to select it as address destination

filter.title: Filter
filter.num_rules_configured_c: No active rule | {n} active rule | {n} active rules
filter.add_prefix_to_spam_subject: Add a prefix to spam messages subject
filter.antivirus_signatures_explanation: Antivirus signature updates are checked at hourly intervals. Changes to antivirus settings will take effect on next signature check
filter.clamav_official_signatures_tooltip: Official ClamAV signatures use a large amount of memory, detect many old threats but are not very effective against the latest malware
filter.third_party_signatures_rating_tooltip: A higher rating means more blocked threats but also a higher probability of false positives. Recommended ratings are Low and Medium
filter.signatures_memory_warning: {installationNode} has less than {recommendedMemoryGb} GiB of RAM. You're strongly advised to keep ClamAV official signatures disabled to avoid memory filling

filter_bypass_rules.title: Bypass rules
filter_bypass_rules.bypass_rules_tooltip: Email filter is bypassed if any of these rules matches
filter_bypass_rules.no_bypass_rule_description: There is no bypass rule configured
filter_bypass_rules.bypass_rule_is_going_to_be_deleted: Bypass rule for {value} is going to be deleted...

settings_mailboxes.title: Mailboxes settings
settings_mailboxes.move_spam_but_no_folder: If "Move spam to junk folder" is enabled, junk folder name is required
settings_mailboxes.sharedseen_explanation_tooltips: If enabled, a message is marked seen (read) by the first user that opens it, with effect for everyone else sharing the same mailbox

settings_master_users.title: Master users
settings_master_users.page_description: Master users are privileged users that can impersonate another user while interacting with their mailbox

settings_queue.title: Queue settings
settings_queue.must_be_inferior_or_equal_to_200: Must be less than or equal to 200
settings_queue.must_be_superior_or_equal_to_1: Must be greater than or equal to 1
settings_queue.maximal_queue_lifetime_tooltip: Once the time period has elapsed, abandon sending the message and return it to the sender.

error.connection_not_supported_by_server: Connection not supported by the server

queue.title: Queue
queue.confirm_delete_all_queued_message: All emails will be deleted, are you sure ?
queue.confirm_delete_queued_message: The email message will be deleted, are you sure?
queue.queue_tooltip: These are the messages that are waiting to be relayed in the SMTP mail queue. In normal conditions, this queue should be empty or contain just a few messages.
queue.maximal_queue_lifetime_info: The maximal queue lifetime is set to {maximal_queue_lifetime} hour. | The maximal queue lifetime is set to {maximal_queue_lifetime} hours.
